name: Nightmare Game (噩梦游戏)
description:
Stay in a warehouse for 24 days,You can get a $1,000,000 as bonus!

Eight people,Think differently.

It is not so easy to get a bonus!

Through eight different perspectives of roles.

Uncover the fog step by step!

Finally let you know the truth!

"Nightmare Game" is a suspense plot game, rich plot is the characteristics of this game.
